name: phpcompatibility/phpcompatibility-paragonie
description: A set of rulesets for PHP_CodeSniffer to check for PHP cross-version compatibility issues in projects, while accounting for polyfills provided by the Paragonie polyfill libraries.

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.7 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHP_CodeSniffer 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.
